item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: Lecture notes aren’t available for all sessions. SES # TOPICS FILES 1–2 Introduction The Solow Model Introduction and the Solow Model (PDF) 3 Consumption and Saving Consumption and Saving (PDF) 4 Labor Supply Labor Supply (PDF) 5 The Neoclassical Growth Model (aka Ramsey Model) The Neoclassical Growth Model (PDF) 7 Endogenous Growth Endogenous Growth (PDF) 8 Fiscal Policy: Taxation, Public Debt, and Redistribution Ricardian Equivalence (PDF) Redistribution As Optimal Social Insurance (PDF)
